Instruction: In a small saucepan, bring water to a boil.'
'Stir in rolled oats and mashed banana.'
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until oats are creamy and tender.'
'Stir in milk and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until heated through.'
'Remove from heat and stir in chopped walnuts and honey.'
Serve warm, optionally topped with additional banana slices and walnuts.'
